sentences.en: At worst his scruples must have been quixotic, not malicious ( Louis Auchincloss )
sentences.cn: 从最坏的角度来说,他的疑虑肯定是出于一时冲动, 而不含恶意 ( 路易斯奥金克洛斯 )

sentences.en: Give me a Don Quixotic Spear so that I fight with the wind wheel.
sentences.cn: 请给我一柄堂吉诃德那样的长矛,我要与风车开战!

sentences.en: He has always lived his life by a hopelessly quixotic code of honour.
sentences.cn: 他生活中一直遵循一种完全不切实际的堂吉诃德式的道德准则。

sentences.en: These may seem quixotic or paradoxical choices, but bear with me.
sentences.cn: 这些似乎是不切实际或自相矛盾的选择, 但请先容我讲完.

sentences.en: This is a vast, exciting, and perhaps quixotic project.
sentences.cn: 这是一个庞大、令人兴奋的项目，但可能有点不切实际。

words.tran_cn: 不切实际的思想或性格；唐吉诃德式性格

trans.tran_cn: 堂吉诃德式的，愚侠的，不切实际的
trans.tran_en: quixotic ideas or plans are not practical and are based on unreasonable hopes of improving the world
